🚀 SmartBrowse AI Assistant – Your All-in-One Productivity and Study Helper

🔗 Why SmartBrowse Uses OpenRouter

OpenRouter is an innovative platform that allows access to a variety of advanced AI language models (LLMs) through efficient API calls. Unlike traditional applications that rely on a single AI model, OpenRouter gives SmartBrowse the ability to integrate multiple specialized models, ensuring unmatched flexibility and performance.


Here’s Why OpenRouter is Key to SmartBrowse:

	•	✨ Access to Multiple LLMs: Use 8 advanced models, each optimized for specific tasks like coding, writing, and problem-solving.

	•	🌟 Constant Updates: OpenRouter regularly introduces new, cutting-edge AI models, keeping you ahead of the game.

	•	🛡️ Total Privacy: Your data is never stored or shared externally. As a serverless application, everything remains secure on your device. 

	•	🌍 Trusted Security: Integration with OpenRouter ensures safe and secure interactions with AI models. 

	•	📦 Lightweight Extension: SmartBrowse requires only 150KB+ of storage, unlike competitors that demand 10GB+ installations for LLMs.

	•	⚡ Unlimited Productivity: With thousands of AI commands daily, SmartBrowse is efficient and cost-effective for even the heaviest users.

⭐ Advanced Language Models

SmartBrowse integrates 8 cutting-edge LLMs, optimized for a variety of tasks:

🦙 Llama 3.2 3B Instruct: Reliable and efficient for everyday tasks.
💻 Qwen 2 7B Instruct: Perfect for coding and debugging.
✨ MythoMax L2 13B: Rich, detailed content creation and creative ideas.
🚀 Mistral 7B Instruct: Ideal for advanced queries and technical research.
🤝 Gemma 2 9B IT (Google): Exceptional for IT tasks, coding, and tech problem-solving.
🧠 Phi-3 Medium 128K (Microsoft): A master of critical thinking, reasoning, and data analysis.
🔓 Toppy M 7B: For unfiltered creative exploration.
🔎 OpenChat 7B: Specialized in problem-solving and deduction.

🛠️ Version Updates

Our commitment to innovation means constant updates to ensure SmartBrowse AI Assistant is always at the cutting edge of productivity and education tools. Here’s how we’ve evolved:

	•	v1.0.0: Initial release packed with essential features, delivering a lightweight AI productivity tool for all users.

	•	v1.5.0: Enhanced UI Design and added Context Menu Features, providing faster access to key tools directly from your browser.
	•	v1.5.1: Improved stability and resolved UI bugs for a smoother AI assistant experience.
	•	v1.6.0: Introduced a built-in Chatbox for direct interaction with AI models, streamlining communication and productivity.
	•	v1.6.1: Increased response speed and usability, further optimizing the AI-powered experience.
	•	v1.7.0: Assistant Settings, Calendar Integration, and To-Do Lists, enabling full AI integration for productivity planning and task management.
	•	v1.8.0: Comprehensive UI Overhaul with updated settings for ease of use. Introduced the AI Website Finder Tool, simplifying research and browsing. Replaced Zephyr 7B with Gemma 2 9B IT, a powerful language model optimized for coding and problem-solving.
